item.description:
Spring is finally here!  You need to be able to rally and know the general rules of tennis to attend this event.  Join players of beginner intermediate - advanced levels as we get together for some volleys and Tennis Games. The game plan is to warm-up with some volleys and then break out into some games or singles, doubles and round robin play! We are here to have fun, get to know each other and play Tennis! Braintree High School offers plenty of opportunity to play tennis on its 6 tennis courts and two practice backboards. This is a great opportunity to just show-up and play!

*Day, Date & Time: Wednesdays @ 6:00pm till dusk

*Location: Braintree High School

*Meeting Place: At the Tennis Courts near the entrance near the street side

*Min/Max: 12. We need at least 4 Yes RSVPs

*Guests: 1 per member

In Case of Inclement Weather: Heavy rains will cancel the event.  If it looks like it will rain in your own area, this does not mean event will be cancelled.  ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

*Directions: Posted on the "Directions to Frequently Used Venues" Discussion Thread on the Message Board (Pinned, so they're on the first page.)
item.how_to_find_us: We will be meeting by the entrance to the Tennis Courts near the street side

group.name: The South Shore Fitness Meetup Group

item.name: Spring into Tennis!
